column2: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] beams a smile at you while handing over a pouch of gold. [target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap] claims it contains the savings accumulated from hard work and donations from the richer families in your realm.

A merchant approaches the court and carefully pleads to make a payment plan for the recent loan taken by [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]. It seems the fruits of [target_treasurer.GetHerHis] labor may have been exaggerated, and since the loan was made in your name, this reflect poorly on you too. What will the consequence be for [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]?

[target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] reminds you of all the good work [target_treasurer.GetSheHe] has done lately. [target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap] thinks that with a fair compensation from [target_treasurer.GetHerHis] own pocket the [requested_province.GetFullName] is only a modest request.

[target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] approaches you: 'My liege, I have a great idea for a monument. Something to raise our cultural status and make the people notice what a great ruler you are. I would require some gold and your patience, and the work would take a year to complete.'

The monument [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] promised is finished. People have gathered to witness the unveiling of the new statue. It is a large portrait of [religious_head.GetTitledFirstName].

The monument [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] promised is finished. The shape of the statue seems a bit off, as it is unveiled some of the crowd seem confused. It is a giant ear with the inscription 'IT LISTENS'.

The monument [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] promised is finished. The statue is unveiled and it's just a bigger version of [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName], only slightly better looking than the real [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName].

The monument promised by [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] is finished. Some people in the crowd cover their children's eyes as the statue is unveiled. It's a couple in the middle of lovemaking, and not exactly presented in a tasteful way.

The monument promised by [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] is finished. At the unveiling, the crowd gasps and some even scream. It's something that resembles a throne, with an eyeless horned creature on top. It smells like blood.
The monument promised by [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] is finished. Upon unveiling, a statue of yourself is revealed and you notice the crowd smiling and giving you a round of applause.

[steward.GetTitledFirstName] smiles at you. 'My liege, I have noticed your mind seems to drift off whenever we discuss monetary issues. I believe that to make things interesting, one must be introduced to the subject where it is directly relevant to oneself. Perhaps you would like to join me tomorrow on a full days work?'

[steward.GetTitledFirstName] starts the day off collecting taxes. Some people frown and complain when they give away their earnings. [steward.GetTitledFirstName] calmly explains why taxes are collected and manages to appease the complainers.

Today, [steward.GetTitledFirstName] brings you to the nearest construction site to evaluate progress. [steward.GetTitledFirstName] notices that the builders are lagging behind the agreed schedule and proceeds to question them. The builders complain about the weather and want more pay to cover the delays. [steward.GetTitledFirstName] looks over your way, awaiting a response.

A friend has come to visit [steward.GetTitledFirstName] this evening. The three of you have a good time discussing your experiences over a fine evening meal. The visitor nods at you, saying: 'How lucky you are, [steward.GetFirstName], to have a liege that understands your work. This cooperation should benefit the both of you.'
That's wonderful news!
I will not tolerate incompetence!
[target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap] is right, job well done.
So be it! Surprise me!
Surely, this will bring us the God's favor.
At least it's original.
I don't know about this.
Children must learn this sooner or later.
I should have seen this coming.
I have no words.
Yes, that would be interesting.
Earning trust is earning gold.
We will hold our end of the deal when you hold yours.
It's been interesting, moreso than many other things I've tried.
We will have to make an example of [target_treasurer.GetHerHim].
[target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap] will be repaid, but not like this.
I don't think so...
Keep calm everyone! I am a snake!
Tear it down! [target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap] will be put in [target_treasurer.GetHerHis] place.
Tear it down!
It's too much, remove it.
Hah! You must be joking, I have better things to do.
Maybe we could squeeze them for some more?
I guess one cannot predict the weather.
It wasn't for me, it feels like stealing.
Understandable, collecting taxes is tough work.
Are you blackmailing me? You'd be happy to keep your job!
Clear the site! You will never work again!
I hated it! We should just kill the peasants and take their money.
